parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Without, outside. Adverb from ek; out(-side, of doors), literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
